metadata.title: CVE-2014-8333 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible
metadata.description: The VMware driver in OpenStack Compute (Nova) before 2014.1.4 allows remoteauthenticated users to cause a denial of service (disk consumption) bydeleting an instance in the resize state.

criterions.comment: nova: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
